function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High rate of COVID-19 infections","Impact":"Increased strain on healthcare system, higher risk of transmission","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control measures, increase healthcare capacity","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, contact tracing apps, rapid testing kits","People":"Healthcare workers, general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government"},{"Description":"Challenges in crisis management","Impact":"Ineffective response to crisis, higher number of cases and deaths","Mitigation":"Provide training for crisis management, establish clear protocols and procedures","Technologies":"Communication tools, data analytics for decision-making","People":"Healthcare managers, administrators","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of coordination between nurses and doctors","Impact":"Inefficient patient care, miscommunication leading to errors","Mitigation":"Promote interprofessional collaboration, establish communication protocols","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, collaborative software tools","People":"Nurses, doctors, healthcare administrators","Owner":"Healthcare organizations"}]}
